metadata.job_description:
Job Title: Database Engineer / Data Management Specialist

Location: Hybrid / Remote / On-site (Flexible)
Employment Type: Full-Time

About the Role

We are seeking a highly skilled Database Engineer ...

conversation.speaker: interviewer
conversation.text: Hello! Thank you for joining us today. To start, could you please introduce yourself and tell me a bit about your background?

conversation.text: Tell me about a time you were working on a project, either at Metavoria or Kripton, where the team faced a significant disagreement on how to approach a problem. How did you navigate that situation, and what was the outcome?

conversation.text: This role involves working closely with both backend developers and DevOps teams. Can you describe your experience collaborating with these teams in past projects, and how you've ensured smooth data flow and effective communication across different technical disciplines?
